attributes.additional_details:
we want the government to stand up and listen and do something about the housing crisis,

there are not enough family sized homes available, overcrowding is becoming an issue, and waits of up to 10 years to be housed in an appropriate sized accommodation, there are people under occupying homes that could be used for families, this needs to be looked into more, help those who want to downsize, and build more 3/4 bed homes as most families in Britian require this, not everyone can afford private rent especially those on minimum wage, it is not all about people on benefits, some are on them for a reason!! there needs to be fairer allocation system than the bidding scheme, as this just doesn't work
